title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: During export operation using JarExporter, an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported JAR file the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported JAR in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed on overwriting the exported JAR file for the second time.
EB: The system should not display an out of sync message when overwriting the exported JAR file during the second export operation.
SR:
To reproduce:

1. Open the PA application on 8/17/01 at 2:03:29 PM.
2. Export a directory (project).
3. Place the exported JAR in the same directory (project).
4. Overwrite the exported JAR file for the second time.

Expected behavior: The system should not display an out of sync message.
